beguile.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She was beguiled by his smooth talk.
beguile.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to persuade or trick someone into doing something
beguile.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He was beguiled into buying another copy of her book.
beguile.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to do something that makes the time pass in an enjoyable way
